title: Power cut schedule for next three days released
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) says that it has approved power cuts of 3 hours and 40 minutes for the 19th, 20th and 21st of May with time slots rotation on the 20th.
Demand Management Schedule - 20th and 21st May 2022 by Adaderana Online on Scribd
